articles.title: H-1B visa: US tech sector scrambles in the face of $100,000 fees - BBC
articles.description: Startups and smaller firms could bear the brunt of Trump's new H-1B visa fee, and some fear it could thwart US innovation.
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump administration wants 10% stake in American lithium miner that sells to GM - TechCrunch
articles.description: Lithium Americas asked for a small change to the loan repayment period, which spurred the latest Trump administration request for equity.
articles.content: The Trump administration might be fond of calling the energy transition the green new scam, but that isnt stopping it from seeking a significant stake in what promises to be the largest lithium mine … [+1354 chars]

articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: YouTube now lets you hide recommendation pop-ups at the end of videos - TechCrunch
articles.description: The decision to let users hide end screens is a welcome addition to the platform, especially since they can end up covering the last bit of a video and make it hard to see what's happening in some cases.
articles.content: YouTube will finally allow you to hide the pop-up recommendations that appear at the end of videos, the company announced on Wednesday. Now when you see an end screen, you can tap a new Hide button i… [+1512 chars]
